name: BopShop!
description:
BopShop! is a chiptune rhythm game where you must multitask while you play. Earn money from hitting notes, and use that money to purchase items mid-song. Deadly bombs will occasionally appear in your lanes: will you have enough money to defend yourself?

This game was made over the course of a semester for a game design class at the University of Utah.

Controls:

Arrow keys - hit notes

Z - purchase shield

X - purchase health

C - purchase x2 score multiplier

R - restart level

M - mute/unmute

Escape - quit game

Backspace- return to menu
